channel.title: Homes on Ruiming Cao's Site
channel.description: Recent content in Homes on Ruiming Cao's Site

item.description: I’m a second-year graduate student in computer science at University of California, Los Angeles (UCLA). I’m working on multi-parametric MRI analysis in Magnetic Resonance Research Labs, Radiology, supervised by Prof. Kyung Hyun Sung. I graduated with B.S. in computer science and in applied mathematics at UCLA in 2017. During my undergrad, I worked on knowledge graph parsing/explainable AI supervised by Prof. Song-Chun Zhu.

item.title: Publications
item.description: Google Scholar profile R. Cao, A. Mohammadian, S. Afshari, S. Shakeri, X. Zhong, D. Enzmann, S. Raman, K. Sung. “Joint prostate Cancer Detection and Gleason Score Prediction in mp-MRI via FocalNet.” IEEE Transactions on Medical Imaging (TMI), early access. DOI: 10.1109/TMI.2019.2901928. R. Cao, X. Zhong, S. Shakeri, A. Mohammadian, S. Afshari, D. Enzmann, S. Raman, K. Sung. “Prostate Cancer Detection and Segmentation in Multi-parametric MRI via CNN and Conditional Random Field.

item.title: Teaching
item.description: I was a teaching assistant for the following courses at UCLA: Fall 2017 CS174A: Introduction to Computer Graphics Winter 2018 CS32: Introduction to Computer Science II - slides(pdf) Spring 2018 CS32: Introduction to Computer Science II - slides(pdf)
